version_description:
▪ Layout landscape mode: Fixed an issue with layout in landscape mode, that would sometimes go under the screen on iOS 11.
▪ Changed colors: Colors modified for rest between cycles.

▪ Layout landscape mode: Fixed an issue with layout in landscape mode, that would sometimes go under the screen on iOS 11.
▪ Changed colors: Colors modified for rest between cycles.

Added Apple Watch Support
Optimized for iPhone X
Bugs fixes and improvements

Optimized for iPhone X
Bugs fixes and improvements

Bugs fixes and improvements.

This version includes:
- Fixed showing wrong data while editing workout timer.
- Various bugs fixes.
- Localization fixes.
- UI and usability improvements.

Thanks for using our app, send us feedback about what do you like or what we have to improve in order to make the app better.

- Performance and speed enhancement. Fixed the delay that could happen on Timer start/stop actions.

- Minor bugs fixes.

This version includes:
- Cooldown time after workout.
- Timers are now resuming after being interrupted.
- Bugs fixes and UI improvements.
- Apple Watch app major changes:
• It can now work standalone.
• Add / edit or delete a timer.
• Cooldown time after workout.
• Added timer settings.
• Added voice assistant.
• Added ticking sound.
• Improved background work.
• Improved timer sounds.
• UI improvements.
• Timers bugs fixes.
